nodes.text: The Noonian sector was a sector located in the Outer Rim Territories that bordered Halthor sector.
The sector was governed by Imperial Moff Trophan Thanis.

Smugglers Thi Sawrtin and Zayl Braith performed "routine" smuggling runs through this sector, until they were captured by Imperial Interdictor cruiser Tory's Catcher. Imperial Captain Gresia Vleen then executed Sawrtin, impounded their ship and sent Braith to the prison of Rol Two.
